wink.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to close and open one eye quickly to communicate something or show that something is a secret or joke
wink.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He winked an eye at his companion.
wink.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to shine with a light that flashes on and off
wink.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: a Christmas tree with lights winking on and off
wink.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a quick action of closing and opening one eye, usually as a signal to someone else
wink.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: ‘You look tired, ’ he said with a knowing wink.
